mapper.insert: insert into userregister (idx, username, id, password, email, gender, height, age, currentWeight, goalWeight, active, state) values (userregister_idx_seq.nextval, #{username}, #{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{height}, #{age}, #{currentWeight}, #{goalWeight}, #{active}, #{state})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userregister WHERE id= #{id}
